name: Stinging Lionfish
oracle_text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.
flavor_text: Starfish are its favorite prey.

name: Underworld Dreams
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Dreams are just one more form of torment.

name: Entrancing Lyre
oracle_text:
You may choose not to untap Entrancing Lyre during your untap step.
{X}, {T}: Tap target creature with power X or less. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Entrancing Lyre remains tapped.
flavor_text: Its strings are wayward threads of fate.

name: Agonizing Remorse
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.
flavor_text: The sharp memory of Daxos's death stabbed into Elspeth's soul.

name: Alseid of Life's Bounty
oracle_text:
Lifelink
{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Dawn-kissed, he nourishes the golden grain." Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Skophos Maze-Warden
oracle_text:
{1}: Skophos Maze-Warden gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever another creature becomes the target of an ability of a land you control named Labyrinth of Skophos, you may have Skophos Maze-Warden fight that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Daxos, Blessed by the Sun
oracle_text:
Daxos's toughness is equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, you gain 1 life.

name: Underworld Fires
oracle_text: Underworld Fires deals 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: The Underworld is anything but a resting place.

name: Pheres-Band Brawler
oracle_text: When Pheres-Band Brawler enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Staggering Insight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."
flavor_text:
"Only cowards flee from the truth."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Tymaret, Chosen from Death
oracle_text:
Tymaret's toughness is equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
{1}{B}: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. You gain 1 life for each creature card exiled this way.

name: Tymaret, Chosen from Death
oracle_text:
Tymaret's toughness is equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
{1}{B}: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. You gain 1 life for each creature card exiled this way.

name: Threnody Singer
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Threnody Singer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

name: Commanding Presence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has first strike and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token."
flavor_text: "In every one of you I see a hero's heart."

name: Furious Rise
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with Furious Rise.
flavor_text: Klothys set out to mend the destiny of Theros, her fury guiding every stitch.

name: Alirios, Enraptured
oracle_text:
Alirios, Enraptured enters the battlefield tapped.
Alirios doesn't untap during your untap step if you control a Reflection.
When Alirios enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 blue Reflection creature token.
flavor_text: "Why would I ever want to look away?"

name: Enemy of Enlightenment
oracle_text:
Flying
Enemy of Enlightenment gets -1/-1 for each card in your opponents' hands.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Evil flourishes where ignorance thrives."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Siona, Captain of the Pyleas
oracle_text:
When Siona, Captain of the Pyleas enters the battlefield, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever an Aura you control becomes attached to a creature you control, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

name: Renata, Called to the Hunt
oracle_text:
Renata's power is equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Alseid of Life's Bounty
oracle_text:
Lifelink
{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Dawn-kissed, he nourishes the golden grain."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Elspeth's Nightmare
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Destroy target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less.
II — Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
III — Exile target opponent's graveyard.

name: Setessan Petitioner
oracle_text: When Setessan Petitioner enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
flavor_text: "Cypress leaves for family, larkspur for protection, amaranth for a bountiful harvest."

name: Heliod's Punishment
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Heliod's Punishment enters the battlefield with four task counters on it.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block. It loses all abilities and has "{T}: Remove a task counter from Heliod's Punishment. Then if it has no task counters on it, destroy Heliod's Punishment."

name: Medomai's Prophecy
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)
I — Scry 2.
II — Choose a card name.
III — When you cast a spell with the chosen name for the first time this turn, draw two cards.
IV — Look at the top card of each player's library.

name: Field of Ruin
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles their library.

name: Mire Triton
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Mire Triton enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Caught between life and death, between land and sea, between thought and oblivion.

name: Sage of Mysteries
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: "I see destruction, suffering, and one tormented glimmer of hope."

name: The Binding of the Titans
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Each player mills three cards.
II — Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each creature card exiled this way, you gain 1 life.
III — Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: The Triumph of Anax
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)
I, II, III — Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of lore counters on The Triumph of Anax.
IV — Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Nessian Wanderer
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put that card into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Hydra's Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Hydra's Growth enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature.

name: Devourer of Memory
oracle_text:
Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, Devourer of Memory gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
{1}{U}{B}: Mill a card.
flavor_text: It slips silently through the still waters of the Labyrinth of Memories to feed.

name: Sweet Oblivion
oracle_text:
Target player mills four cards.
Escape—{3}{U}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor_text: When memory is torment, oblivion is bliss.

name: Cling to Dust
oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, you gain 3 life. Otherwise, you draw a card.
Escape—{3}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor_text: In bleak Tizerus, all hope crumbles in your grasp.

name: Eidolon of Inspiration
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Agios was felled by a minotaur's blade, but I swear I have seen him since—in the midst of battle, wherever help is needed most."
—Phrokos, soldier of Akros

name: Reverent Hoplite
oracle_text: When Reverent Hoplite enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
flavor_text: "Zeal is the sharpest blade, and piety the strongest shield."

name: Fateful End
oracle_text: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.
flavor_text:
"Everything will be put back in its proper place."
—Klothys, god of destiny

name: Impending Doom
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and attacks each combat if able.
When enchanted creature dies, Impending Doom deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: "Feast, for your next meal may be your last!"

name: Phalanx Tactics
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Each other creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Every soldier has a place to stand and a role to play.

name: Mystic Repeal
oracle_text: Put target enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text:

—Karametra, god of harvests

name: Callaphe, Beloved of the Sea
oracle_text:

oracle_text: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

Flying

name: Hateful Eidolon
oracle_text:
Lifelink

flavor_text: From the echoes of a violent life, a terrible foe is born.

oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Nessian Hornbeetle.
flavor_text:

Reach

{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Blood Aspirant deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.

Enchant creature

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
Destroy target creature.

oracle_text: Return up to three target creatures and/or enchantments to their owners' hands.

Flash
